com.nkoiv.mists.game.sprites

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nkoiv.mists.game.sprites.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends Object
    Sprite-class handles (movable) images. Both animate (animated=true) and inanimate sprites are handled by this same class. Since the all the render-method does is give an image to a graphics container, only the sprite itself needs to know if it's animated or not.
    Author:
    nkoiv

      • update

        public void update(double time,
                   double targetX,
                   double targetY)
        Update() with targetX and targetY moves the sprite towards the target with the velocity it has, but never past the target. This can be used for fine manoeuvring.
        Parameters:
        time - Time since last update
        targetX - X coordinates to move towards
        targetY - Y coordinates to move towards

      • update

        public void update(double time)
        Update uses the velocity it has and the time given, moving the sprite towards the velocity according to the time it has (velocity * time).
        Parameters:
        time -
